name: Mosaic Maze (itch)
description:
Mosaic Maze is a minimalistic hardcore precision platforming game for PC. The rules are simple – move around the mosaic, using infinite jumps and careful movement to avoid red tiles, while making use of other tiles to help you progress through the levels. Each loop you make around the mosaic changes it, building a progressively more difficult obstacle course ahead of you. Skill, precision, careful planning and lots of practice are essential for navigating the levels and reaching the end.

The game features smooth, responsive controls, collectible bonuses which unlock extra levels and cosmetic goodies, and over 200 levels split into 6 worlds, each with it's own unique aesthetics and mechanics.
